headline: The Republicans and the Jan. 6 Commission

headline: Iran Clears Way for Hard-line Judiciary Chief to Become President
snippet: Potential rivals to Ebrahim Raisi, Ayatollah Khamenei’s favored choice, were barred from the June 18 election, and the remaining candidates do not present a serious challenge.
abstract: Potential rivals to Ebrahim Raisi, Ayatollah Khamenei’s favored choice, were barred from the June 18 election, and the remaining candidates do not present a serious challenge.

headline: ‘Democracy Is Truly in Crisis’
snippet: Readers decry Republican efforts that they view as voter suppression. Also: Allocating vaccines; teaching our children about race.
abstract: Readers decry Republican efforts that they view as voter suppression. Also: Allocating vaccines; teaching our children about race.

headline: Here’s a look at explaining the Wuhan lab-leak theory.

headline: G.O.P. Rivals Trade Insults in Chaotic N.Y.C. Mayoral Debate
snippet: Curtis Sliwa, the founder of the Guardian Angels, and Fernando Mateo, a restaurateur, yelled at each other repeatedly during the free-wheeling virtual debate.
abstract: Curtis Sliwa, the founder of the Guardian Angels, and Fernando Mateo, a restaurateur, yelled at each other repeatedly during the free-wheeling virtual debate.

headline: The State of California’s ‘State of Jefferson’
snippet: A look at the fascination with secession in the state's rural far north.
abstract: Wednesday: In California’s rural far northern counties, furor for the recall has taken hold alongside the region’s fascination with secession.

headline: Overcrowded Border Jails Give Way to Packed Migrant Child Shelters
snippet: Federal documents indicate that while the Biden administration has cleared migrant children from border detention centers, now shelters run by the Department of Health and Human Services are strained.
abstract: Federal documents indicate that while the Biden administration has cleared migrant children from border detention centers, now shelters run by the Department of Health and Human Services are strained.
byline: By Eileen Sullivan, Zolan Kanno-Youngs and Luke Broadwater
